name: WPBatch simple Slider
author: MTM Sujan

sections.description:
This Plugin is developed for them who are looking for a simple but gorgeous slider plugin like a carousel slider
hopefully it will solve your issue

Don’t wait.. install it and check how it works and how it looks

Demo: WPBatch Simple Slider

Please check this demo and decide whether you would use it or not..
sections.installation:
1. Upload wpbatch-simple-slider.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. You will see a new menu in the dashboard “Simple Slider”… add some images and texts from there
  4. now just add this shortcode anywhere in the page, post or widgets 
[simple_slider]

or Place



in your templates php files


Good Luck
sections.faq:
is it so tough to install and setup?

No, absolutely not
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • initial first version of WPBatch Simple Slider

short_description: Sometimes, we find a very simple but gorgeous slider plugin.. but we fail to find one.. Hopefully this plugin will solve your problem.. cheers!!
